document.full_text: an appeals court has granted the nfl owners' request for a stay of a prior ruling to halt their lockout of players, according to a report on the league's website on monday.
document.title: court rules to keep nfl lockout of players in place
lines_and_colors: an appeals court has granted the nfl owners' request for a stay of a prior ruling to halt their lockout of players, according to a report on the league's website on monday.
